xuiDropdown
directive in module xui

Description

XUI Dropdown component. The styling can be altered by applying a class to the container element. Currently supported classes are xui-dropdown-inline and xui-dropdown--justified.

Usage

as element:
<xui-dropdown
       [caption="{string}"]
       [is-disabled="{boolean}"]
       items-source="{array}"
       [on-changed="{function}"]
       [on-secondary-action="{function}"]
       [display-format="{string}"]
       [display-value="{string}"]
       [display-value-fn="{function}"]
       [ng-model="{object}"]
       [selected-item="{object}"]
       [item-template-url="{string}"]
       [placeholder="{string}"]
       [is-required="{boolean}"]
       [is-editable="{boolean}"]
       [clear-on-blur="{boolean}"]
       [dropdown-append-to-body="{boolean}"]>
</xui-dropdown>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
caption
(optional)
string

Value used as a label for the dropdown.

is-disabled
(optional)
boolean

Value used to set dropdown to read only mode.

items-sourcearray

Array of values that are bound to the list of dropdown items. If the array itself consists of several arrays, e. g. [["item 1", "item 2"], ["item 3", "item 4"]], each of the sub-arrays will be treated as a separate group of items. Logical separators will be shown between these groups.

on-changed
(optional)
function

Callback event when the current selection has changed.

on-secondary-action
(optional)
function

Callback event that provides split-button behavior and interaction.

displayFormat
(optional)
string

Template for formatting selected item on the dropdown button.

displayValue
(optional)
string

Name of the item property that will be shown in the dropdown menu.

displayValueFn
(optional)
function

Template function for formatting items in dropdown.

ng-model
(optional)
object

This component also supports ng-model directive for binding to forms.

selected-item
(optional)
object

Two-way model value that contains the currently selected item.

item-template-url
(optional)
string

URL of the content to load for the items in the dropdown.

placeholder
(optional)
string

Text displayed when no item is selected.

is-required
(optional)
boolean

Indicates whether a selection must be made for validation.

is-editable
(optional)
boolean

Turns the dropdown into a combobox.

clear-on-blur
(optional)
boolean

Clears combobox input if its value is not in a source array.

dropdown-append-to-body
(optional)
boolean

Appends the menu to '$body' instead of the parent element.
